'''Roman Beguns''' is an actor. He is known for his roles in films such as ''Mercenaries'' and ''Zenith House'', and the television show ''Halo: Nightfall''.

In [[Season 5]] he will portray a [[Gladiator]].<ref>[http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4172785]</ref>
